question: What problem does SportsBuddy.ai solve?
answer: Creating high-quality game recaps with video highlights and visual annotations, like those shared by the NBA and broadcasters, can be time-consuming and resource-intensive . SportsBuddy.ai simplifies this process by combining intuitive interactions and natural language with real-time, interactive visualizations. We make it easy for you to effortlessly create pro-level clips, crafting informative, engaging, and personalized video highlights.

question: Who is SportsBuddy Studio suitable for?
answer: Our flagship product, SportsBuddy Studio, is perfect for anyone looking  to edit sports clips and tell sports-related stories—whether focusing on tactics, details, data, or simply highlighting players. Our users include content creators, coaches, trainers, team marketing professionals, professional and amateur players, and fans!

question: Can I use the videos I create on SportsBuddy Studio for commercial purposes or publish them externally?
answer: Yes, you can freely use and publish the videos you create on SportsBuddy Studio for commercial purposes. Just make sure that you own the copyright for any video clips you upload.

question: How long does it take to upload a clip?
answer: It typically takes less than 5 minutes to upload a 30-second clip. However, the time may vary depending on the length of your clip and the traffic on our platform. We’re constantly working to improve our backend pipeline to make the process even quicker!

question: How do I get started with SportsBuddy Studio?
answer:
Here's how you can make your first fancy video! We also have tutorial videos for you:

1. Sign up for an account on SportsBuddy Studio.
2. Click the Media icon on the top left and select your video to upload, or simply drag and drop your video.
3. Monitor the video processing progress in real-time! This can take around 3 to 5 minutes, depending on the length of your clip and the traffic on our platform.
4. Once the processing is complete, the screen will display a game ID for your clip. Click on this to start your editing journey!

question: What are the video requirements?
answer:
• Format: Only mp4 format and files less than 50MB are supported at this time.
• Clip Angle: To ensure the best processing results, start your video clip with a broadcast angle—a wide shot of the playing field as seen in sports broadcasts should be the first frame of your video.

DO NOT CLOSE: Make sure not to close the SportsBuddy Studio page, or you'll lose track of the processing progress. We apologize for any inconvenience and are working to address these limitations as soon as possible.
